text: z the demand on the borough’s transport networks beyond operational limits and/or capacity; z the potential reduction in the quality of stations, stops, or services; or z restrictions on access to the same services. 19.16 Development proposals are expected to be well-integrated with the public transport network and contribute to its efficient running and service improvements. Developers should ensure they engage early with relevant bodies (e.g. Transport for London) to establish the likely impacts and/or appropriate mitigation measures towards public transport to be funded through developer contributions in accordance with Policy DV5. 19.17 Part 2 identifies the role of development proposals in supporting improvements and enhancements to the borough’s transport and freight infrastructure (including safeguarded wharves and consolidation Tower Hamlets Local Plan 347 MOVEMENT AND CONNECTIVITY
